overview: A tough sailor, Fotis, returns to Greece to marry his beloved and to settle certain inheritance issues with his twin brother Fifis, who is an effeminate artist. Their striking resemblance will upset the lives of both of them equally.

production_companies.name: Afoi Roussopouloi-G. Lazaridis - D. Sarris - K. Psarras

title: Fifis the Unbeatable
